value:
Maybe my big brother and Wil have
been brought to this world like me...

There are so many strong people
here. I wonder if that knight is one
of them...$k$pThe knight on the white horse who
saved my village from bandits!

Out on patrol, huh? Is it OK if I tag
along too?

Doesn't this bread smell great? Baked
it myself, you know. I kneaded lots of
fruits and herbs into it.

Look at all these nuts and berries I
picked! Hm, what should I make? A
necklace might be nice.

Hey, I'm Rebecca! Just here with
a hello from $Nf!

Big brother Dan, Wil... Come home
soon! I promise I'll keep working hard
until then!

I'm going to be strong enough to
defend my village from bandits!

I'm just taking a little break. That's
OK, right?

I-is it really all right to give me so
much? Wow...

I'm Rebecca! I love to cook, and I can
even use a bow!

U-um, excuse me, Summoner!
I've been waiting to talk to you.$k$pI'm sorry, I'm sure you must be tired.
But there's something I wanted to ask
you about.$k$pI could use some advice. I'm looking
for a couple people: my big brother,
Dan, and neighbor, Wil.$k$pThey both left our village without a
word one day... I was thinking that
maybe they could be here.$k$pIf you happen to see the two of them,
please tell them that Rebecca is really
steaming mad at them!$k$pI have no idea where they are, or if
they're eating properly... Ugh! I'm so
worried, it's making ME hungry!
I'll try my best!
Steady...
How am I doing?
I won't miss!
Dan...
I'm Rebecca! I hunt with my bow!
*gasp* Are you trying to play a game with me?
Wil's my neighbor. We play together most days.
I love shooting my bow, but I still have a tough time changing the string.
My brother Dan is really kind.
I wonder what the world is like outside my village...
I can cook, so I'll make you lunch sometime!
OK!
What should I do?
Ready to go!
